ingredients.ingredient: 1 (23 ounce) SmithfieldÂ® Garlic & Herb Seasoned Pork Sirloin
1 cup shredded provolone cheese, or as needed

cookingTips: Warm the pork sirloin gently to preserve its moisture and flavor
Toast the sub rolls lightly to provide structural support and prevent sogginess
Add cheese while pork is still warm so it melts slightly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook through heating pre-cooked pork, toasting rolls, and assembling a quick but quality sandwich with fresh herbs and cheese.
